ProgramEnrlEligibilityCrit.name: ProgramEnrlEligibilityCrit
ProgramEnrlEligibilityCrit.description: Represents a junction between Program and Enrollment Eligibility Criteria objects.

EnrollmentEligibilityCritId.description: The enrollment eligibility criteria associated with the program enrollment eligibility criteria.

IsRequired.description: Indicates whether an enrollment eligibility criterion is mandatory (true) or optional (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the program enrollment eligibility criteria.

ProgramId.description: The program associated with the program enrollment eligibility criteria.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the program enrollment eligibility criteria.

Type.description: Specifies the type of enrollment eligibility criteria.
